All Implemented Interfaces:
city.cs.engine.DestructionListener, city.cs.engine.StepListener, EventListener
public class Alucard extends Enemy implements city.cs.engine.StepListener, city.cs.engine.DestructionListener
Represents the boss enemy "Alucard" in the game.
